Frp table.name: FRP Table
Frp table.use: Home offices, retail stores, exhibitions, educational institutions, events or picnics, workspace, meeting rooms, dining room
Frp table.description: Buddha Fiber offers a lightweight, durable, and long-lasting solution for various settings. Its modern design makes it suitable for indoor and outdoor spaces, providing a stylish and practical addition to any environment.

FRp Receiption Chair.name: FRP Reception Chair
FRp Receiption Chair.use: Office, college, school, health care, government office, workshops, and retail store
FRp Receiption Chair.description: A contemporary, durable, and stylish seating option designed to enhance reception areas for both indoor and outdoor spaces. It provides comfort and class while welcoming guests with style and durability.

FRP Desk Bench.name: FRP Desk Bench
FRP Desk Bench.use: Schools, universities, offices, educational institutions, healthcare centers, art and craft organizations, study areas, government offices
FRP Desk Bench.description: A durable, lightweight, and long-lasting desk and bench solution with modern design for indoor and outdoor use. Buddha Fiber ensures a personalized touch with a wide range of colors and designs.

FRP Moon Table.name: FRP Moon Table
FRP Moon Table.use: School & colleges, home offices, libraries, conference rooms, group study rooms, reception areas
FRP Moon Table.description: A unique and modern piece of furniture designed to resemble a curved moon. The Moon Table is a combination of artistic design and functional utility, bringing elegance and creativity to any space.

FRP Bathtubs.name: FRP Bathtubs
FRP Bathtubs.use: Apartments, residential bathrooms, hotels & resorts, homes, spas & wellness centers, healthcare facilities, rental properties
FRP Bathtubs.description: FRP bathtubs blend durability, elegance, and luxury, transforming your bathing space into a sanctuary of relaxation. Customizable in size, shape, and design for unique arrangements.

FRP Dustbin.name: FRP Dustbin
FRP Dustbin.use: Indoor and outdoor settings, commercial and industrial facilities, recycling stations, public events
FRP Dustbin.description: FRP dustbins provide a reliable and stylish waste management solution, ensuring a clean and hygienic environment. They are an eco-friendly alternative to traditional waste bins.

FRP Motu Patlu Dustbin.name: FRP Motu Patlu Dustbin
FRP Motu Patlu Dustbin.description: Designed to create an engaging waste management solution for children, inspired by the popular Indian animated series 'Motu Patlu'. Combines functionality with fun to make waste management appealing.

FRP Feeding Tray.name: FRP Feeding Tray
FRP Feeding Tray.use: Poultry farming, cattle rearing, goat farming, cow farming
FRP Feeding Tray.description: Constructed using high-quality fiberglass reinforced plastic, known for strength, durability, and resistance to corrosion. Customizable sizes and shapes for specific needs.

FRP Gamala (Flower Pot).name: FRP Gamala (Flower Pot)
FRP Gamala (Flower Pot).description: FRP flower pots are a popular choice for both indoor and outdoor gardening due to their durability, lightweight nature, and aesthetic appeal. Provides a visually stunning addition to any environment.
